bb137ece3360aada.title: Once a Fox
bb137ece3360aada.description: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took Shusui, and Kawamatsu shares his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. Soon, they find a room filled with swords, and Hiyori tells Zoro to give Shusui back to the land of Wano.

ff23a6af3ec03de6.title: Momonosuke, Heir of the Kozuki Family
ff23a6af3ec03de6.description: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed, and its retainers propose an alliance to help topple one of the Four Emperors: Kaido of the Beast Pirates! But first, Luffy has some important Straw Hat business to attend to.

43f35a8d2344e4bd.title: Gear Fourth
43f35a8d2344e4bd.description: The birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa, so Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country. Meanwhile, Luffy digs deep into his training to provide an answer born of rubber and haki to combat Doflamingo's might.

530cb688e4a14037.title: Hody's Dark Secret! The Straw Hats' Arrival
530cb688e4a14037.description: Shirahoshi and Jinbe hurry to free King Neptune but run headlong into a trap. There, Hody reveals a shocking truth about the history of his revolution, but even in the face of Hody's cruelty, Shirahoshi holds true to her mother's dying wish.

deb428b998deccb3.title: Hancock's Confession
deb428b998deccb3.description: Impressed by Luffy's efforts to protect the secret of the snake sisters, Hancock reveals the story behind the familiar mark on their backs. Their childhood was tragic, suffered at the hands of a corrupt group that Luffy knows all too well.

6c21e436b76eb08a.title: Become My Servant
6c21e436b76eb08a.description: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny, and Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action. As Zeus pursues the Straw Hats, Nami keeps him occupied with a shocking surprise that might stop Big Mom in her tracks!

c00d7e66a58605f5.title: Way of Life
c00d7e66a58605f5.description: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing his whereabouts to his enemies. Elsewhere, Luffy uses Charlotte Brûlée as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom.

64cce14bc6a2ddd6.title: About My Torso
64cce14bc6a2ddd6.description: Luffy's group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles an aggressive mysterious torso, and Vice Admiral Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected! Meanwhile, Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for a group of children.

dbd237fb1f10f8eb.title: Arriving at Dressrosa! The Country of Passion, Love, and Toys!
dbd237fb1f10f8eb.description: Dressrosa! The Straw Hats split up and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy's group encounters an intriguing blind man whose luck has run dry.

229f13cdc5a2d1a0.title: The Honorable
229f13cdc5a2d1a0.description: The wedding and the precious cake crumble to pieces around Big Mom as a slew of Luffys wreak havoc. The chaos pushes Big Mom past the edge of sanity, so her children make a move against Germa while Pudding takes aim at Sanji.

70fca5e85aa14d7e.title: Yeti Cool Brothers
70fca5e85aa14d7e.description: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo, and the story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed.

03884fda0a53507c.title: A Woman's Secret
03884fda0a53507c.description: The wounded Zoro wakes up to find out the shocking identity of the woman he saved and is told the unbelievable tale of twenty years earlier. Meanwhile, Luffy's “training” is not getting anywhere, but a surprising person gives him his first lesson.

a395624073945f12.title: The Experiment Begins! Shinokuni Unleashed!
a395624073945f12.description: A candy addiction leads the children to return, and Caesar plans to show the world his new and improved Smiley! Luffy and the Straw Hats next find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of gas that turns living things into statues of ash!

a14da417b440317c.title: Shimotsuki Yasuie, the Daimyo of Hakumai
a14da417b440317c.description: Tonoyasu has been strung up and awaits his inevitable execution while all of Wano is shocked to find out who he really is. The citizens cry out in outrage, and the doomed man raises his voice in a final act of rebellion against Shogun Orochi.

7ebb072ae735e0d6.title: Pirate Alliance
7ebb072ae735e0d6.description: Luffy agrees to an unexpected alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master of the island unleashes something extremely deadly!

249f6bd52a9df22a.title: The Underwater Prison, Impel Down
249f6bd52a9df22a.description: To rescue his brother Ace, Luffy must infiltrate the well-guarded prison Impel Down. He eludes the watchful eyes of security for a time, and then, for better or worse, a certain red-nosed criminal appears.

8c5bc2f4c2506f0e.title: Understood
8c5bc2f4c2506f0e.description: The Straw Hats divide and conquer: one group to go save Sanji, and the other to Wano! But just before their departure, the tremendous elephant quakes as Jack's fleet launches an aggressive attack on the monstrous Zunesha.

bfbc50ab80b8f388.title: General Zombie Night! Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four
bfbc50ab80b8f388.description: The Straw Hats learn that the head honcho on the island is one of the Seven Warlords, and he has concocted a shadowy scheme. As Absalom rallies the zombies, the master of Thriller Bark awakens.

0f9242f0446bd9f6.title: Fujitora's Outlook
0f9242f0446bd9f6.description: Viola, once a princess of the Dressrosan royal family, shows Luffy and the others a secret entrance into the palace. In the meantime, Admiral Fujitora reveals his audacious plans for the Seven Warlords of the Sea!

33f0b6a8f74419cb.title: Sabo's Adventure
33f0b6a8f74419cb.description: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army and how he reunited with his brother Luffy at the colosseum.

56cbfa1973de2c93.title: Iron Mask Duval
56cbfa1973de2c93.description: The Straw Hats arrive at Duval's (eerily quiet) base and manage to locate Camie's captured friend. Realizing the captive's identity, the Straw Hats reluctantly agree to rescue him, and only in exchange for directions to Fishman Island.

800808c25f137966.title: Mink Pedro, Captain of the Guardians
800808c25f137966.description: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope left to the Sunny is to blast right through it all. Meanwhile, Pedro comes face-to-face with his past and does what he must to ensure the success of his friends.

c19325ddeb283c88.title: The Whirl Spider
c19325ddeb283c88.description: Luffy's progress is halted by Mihawk, but the Whitebeard Pirates counter with a swordsman of their own. Then, when an army of human weapons encircle the battlefield, Luffy and his allies find themselves overwhelmed by their explosive attacks.

3d1aefcf432a983b.title: A Gift to a New Era
3d1aefcf432a983b.description: Though Ace and Whitebeard have been killed, the Marines seek to wipe out every last pirate, even as they retreat. In the confusion, Akainu sets his eyes on the unconscious Luffy. Meanwhile, Blackbeard reveals his true scheme and a terrifying new power!

5f4173f39d77a454.title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY
5f4173f39d77a454.description: A young Linlin managed to enrage the giants of Elbaph, but Mother Carmel begged for clemency on her behalf. After Carmel's mysterious disappearance, Linlin fell in with a new cohort and found her reason to go on living.

389690b1898d53b3.title: The Alliance's Target and the Departure!
389690b1898d53b3.description: Bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast. The weary Marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker.

9bbd11777b87be38.title: B Block on Fire! Outlandish Competitors and King Punch!
9bbd11777b87be38.description: The battle in Block B hits a crescendo as the Fighting King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Kingdom of Prodence faction unravels!

bb17b23464de3a2e.title: Void
bb17b23464de3a2e.description: Perona prepares to leave Gloom Island after she finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is still alive. Meanwhile, Moria raids the infamous Pirate Island with his zombie army to retrieve his old friend from Blackbeard.

d569cc654b10e9bc.title: Okobore Town
d569cc654b10e9bc.description: Otama is kidnapped by Kaido's gifters and taken to a flourishing settlement called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking headliner was expecting her. Luffy, Zoro, and the samurai Okiku rush to her rescue.

2b8e00963722f179.title: Infinite Hell
2b8e00963722f179.description: Luffy is back in action, and he prepares to set off, now with even more powerful allies who have ties to his old man. When they reach the lowest level of Impel Down, the legendary Level 6, they are in for a few new surprises.

e7169d57e914cacf.title: Hah
e7169d57e914cacf.description: Luffy is sent to a great mine where prisoners must endure harsh, forced labor. There, he has an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku rushes to the ruins of Oden Castle to confirm the safety of the Straw Hats and the others.

ec04c7aa8d3124f2.title: The Dragon Named Momonosuke and the Menacing Snow Fruit User!
ec04c7aa8d3124f2.description: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Vice Admiral Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo. Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet.

63feec39eb20d896.title: The Underground World
63feec39eb20d896.description: Usopp and Robin travel via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe. On the surface, Franky makes his way to the Toys House to cause a distraction to help his crewmates, but standing in his way is quite the guy!

6ff30e4ec0f30ebd.title: Zoro's Strongest One-Sword Style and Mocha's Plight!
6ff30e4ec0f30ebd.description: Zoro vs. Monet: a duel to the bitter end. But when Tashigi comes to lend a hand, she will need her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness. Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.

f67401a8ad833d64.title: Flying Fish Riders
f67401a8ad833d64.description: As the Straw Hats journey to Fishman Island, they reach the Red Line, the halfway point along the Grand Line. When a sea king appears, Luffy easily dispatches it, but it spits up a mermaid and a talking starfish onto the deck of the Sunny.

8bac355778a9b643.title: Cora
8bac355778a9b643.description: Corazón had finally obtained the Op Op Fruit! Doflamingo and his Family were zeroing in on Corazón and Law's whereabouts, so Corazón hid Law long enough to let him escape, even at the risk of his own life.

6fc714eae9e6fe36.title: Adventure on the Archipelago of Dancing Soap Bubbles
6fc714eae9e6fe36.description: The Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago to prepare the Sunny for its undersea voyage to Fishman Island. During their search for a coating mechanic, the Straw Hats encounter the Celestial Dragons, the cruel rulers of the World Government.

fb5b27ae364dd9b4.title: Prostration
fb5b27ae364dd9b4.description: The people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy as they remember the hardships endured and the actions taken to free them. As they beg King Riku to resume the crown, Admiral Fujitora shocks onlookers with an unexpected display of humility.

469fcd1ee7ba28d0.title: My Name Is Kin'emon!!
469fcd1ee7ba28d0.description: Law's plan to infiltrate Caesar's facility hits a snag when an unexpected guest complicates things. Meanwhile, Chopper investigates the Master's lab, and the mysterious samurai shows what he can do with a full body!

b6104ec37de6cdf2.title: The Voice from the New World
b6104ec37de6cdf2.description: When pirates working for Big Mom appear, Fishman Island falls under threat from an adversary even stronger than Hody. Luffy steps up to save the fishmen once again but may doom himself by antagonizing one of the strongest pirates in the New World.

7aed3f0ad1e51f9b.title: Luffy vs. Commander Cracker
7aed3f0ad1e51f9b.description: Luffy squares off against a commander of Big Mom, Charlotte Cracker, whose powers may prove more troublesome than they appear. Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate Whole Cake Island and work out a plan to avoid getting caught.

45b3b24da28a3656.title: Brook's Promise! The Eighth Member
45b3b24da28a3656.description: At death's door, the Rumbar Pirates sang "Binks' Brew" one last time and recorded it in a tone dial, hoping to one day deliver it to Laboon. With their new crewmate and musician Brook on board, the Straw Hats bid farewell to Lola's crew.

7f65d59633db48f7.title: The Empty Throne
7f65d59633db48f7.description: As the Reverie commences, Emperors Big Mom and Kaido both set their sights on Luffy! Meanwhile, a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world, and the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma.

f1a8aaefe9421fbf.title: Diamante and Pica
f1a8aaefe9421fbf.description: The final round at Corrida Colosseum kicks off, and Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the prize! Meanwhile, Luffy and co., en route to Doflamingo, are faced with an immovable member of the Donquixote Family.

f603f8441d6ce1a0.title: Oars' Awakening and Brook vs. Ryuma!
f603f8441d6ce1a0.description: Dead for 500 years and left in a deep freeze since, Oars awakens, fueled by Luffy's shadow. Soon after, Nami, Usopp, and Chopper are discovered hiding inside Perona's pet bear, and Absalom abducts Nami for his demented marriage ceremony.

7a01dcb257d7e638.title: Vitality Response
7a01dcb257d7e638.description: Refreshed and refueled, Franky turns the tide in his battle with Fukuro. Meanwhile, Zoro and Sogeking must find a way to compensate for their self-imposed handicap, and Chopper unfortunately comes face-to-face with Kumadori.

e2b5d7fb2488734c.title: Adventure in the Ocean Depths! 10 Kilometers Below the Surface!
e2b5d7fb2488734c.description: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji leave the relative safety of the Sunny to face the Kraken in its own territory. Putting their powerful new skills to work, they survive the encounter but are swept away by a downward current and become lost in the murky depths.

234c11bd2515d4c4.title: The Arrival of the Mysterious Man and the News Coo!
234c11bd2515d4c4.description: Doflamingo—a.k.a. Joker—arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc! Only an icy intercession can save Smoker and send Joker off to rethink his strategy. Meanwhile, the Sunny sails through the rough seas of the New World where even a bit of hail portends doom!

2d15efe76715a15f.title: Bird Cage
2d15efe76715a15f.description: Sabo makes a risky move to end the championship battle, and Luffy hurries to free Law. Doflamingo's apparent defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos, but he may have a trick or two left up his sleeve.

2612baa3e80b4aa8.title: Otohime, Fisher Tiger, and the Sun Pirates! The Fateful Encounter!
2612baa3e80b4aa8.description: Queen Otohime tried to lead the Ryugu Kingdom into an era of coexistence between humans and fishmen. At the same time, the heroic Fisher Tiger battled humans to free their slaves from captivity.

460c0ae9d0af4d4c.title: Fired
460c0ae9d0af4d4c.description: The Straw Hats struggle to catch up to Luffy, who is already on the main island wreaking havoc for the Marines. Meanwhile, Robin learns from Spandam that the terms of their deal have changed, and he somehow has rights to a buster call.

0c981c3871d1953a.title: Adventure on the Island of Women
0c981c3871d1953a.description: Luffy finds himself alone, stranded and starving on an unfamiliar island. After a run-in with some exotic mushrooms, he is approached by a team of female warriors who could be friend... or foe.

d20fc077a4b2d0d3.title: At the Sea Forest! Arlong and Hody
d20fc077a4b2d0d3.description: Jinbe reunites with Luffy in the undersea forest and reveals a shocking connection to an old foe. The former Warlord begins a tale of when two famous figures fought to undo the animosity that existed between humans and fishmen.

e53814dfd810bdb9.title: The Mastermind in the Shadows and the Battle Between Gas and Rubber!
e53814dfd810bdb9.description: Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar's reign of terror to a brutal end! With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo flies into action to protect his criminal operation!

eb91e70c64c7f00b.title: The Mysterious Visitor! The Two Warlords Meet!
eb91e70c64c7f00b.description: While the Straw Hats continue to wear away at Oars, Nami confronts Perona attempting to escape on board the Thousand Sunny, but the sudden appearance of a large, mysterious figure soon makes her efforts moot.

17ba7589040104a9.title: Totto Land
17ba7589040104a9.description: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible. There, the Straw Hats encounter Sanji's betrothed, Pudding, but when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer is truly shocking.

8400abc47432041c.title: Oris Plaza
8400abc47432041c.description: His adopted son within reach, Whitebeard charges forth, undeterred by the strongest the Marines have to offer. With both sides swinging between victory and defeat, the battlefield plunges into chaos. Then Marco takes to the sky and soars to Ace's side!

4b235b2a6b2cd15c.title: Bellamy the Pirate
4b235b2a6b2cd15c.description: Luffy continues to fight the Doflamingo doppelganger but keeps accidentally attacking Bellamy instead. Meanwhile, the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface, and Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.

730d46e73e730569.title: Doflamingo's Relentless Pursuit
730d46e73e730569.description: Revealed is the sad fate of King Riku, his army, and his daughter, Princess Viola, as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. Not to mention, all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.

759018d0ce8fc7dc.title: Duval's Tragedy
759018d0ce8fc7dc.description: Blaming Sanji for his misfortunes, Duval swears vengeance on the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders attempt to sink the Sunny, but the ship is far from vulnerable. Finally, Sanji himself faces Duval in a bid to end things.

cc33ebfa878cc69d.title: The Shocking Truth of Tiger! The End of the Sun Pirates
cc33ebfa878cc69d.description: Fisher Tiger's past quickly caught up to him, and he left his crew with a sobering, final command. While Jinbe vowed to uphold Tiger's and Otohime's ideals, Arlong's resentment only grew, and soon, the Sun Pirates faced a crisis of identity.

d7610f0eaf68fb10.title: SMILE
d7610f0eaf68fb10.description: The truth behind the smiles of the Ebisu villagers finally comes to light, the Shogun and Kaido's plan revealed! And in Udon Luffy and Hyo are shocked to see Captain Kid return in chains alongside a smiling newcomer.

38c03fa5b18a6e21.title: Adventure in the Mysterious Forest
38c03fa5b18a6e21.description: Luffy's group makes its way toward Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy. Before they realize it, they are lost in the Seducing Woods! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his older brother.

5257339f9a34bce0.title: Corrida Colosseum! The Great Tournament
5257339f9a34bce0.description: Zoro and co. strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji gets distracted by the alluring dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosan. Meanwhile, the prize of the late Ace's devil fruit draws Luffy and Franky to the colosseum.

b52d925773bc0973.title: The Curly Hat Pirates Arrive
b52d925773bc0973.description: While they put up a good fight, the minks were not able to subdue Jack. In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack, Chopper and Sanji rushed in to save the fallen minks and enlisted the help of Caesar to overcome the lingering gas problem.

cff8baa1ceca5710.title: Raise the Counterattack Signal
cff8baa1ceca5710.description: Luffy makes it just outside the courthouse when Blueno of CP9 appears before him, and on the main road, the Straw Hats near the courthouse plaza aboard Sodom and Gomorrah. Meanwhile, Sogeking comes across a dejected Oimo.

528f3722f5082320.title: Sanji vs. Jabra
528f3722f5082320.description: As Nami drags the wounded Sogeking from the fight to go find Robin, he suddenly counters with a better idea. In the meantime, Sanji faces off against Jabra's Iron Body Kenpo, and, to break the latter's defenses, Sanji unveils his latest technique.

6fdae84e9f5053c7.title: Punk Hazard
6fdae84e9f5053c7.description: Fresh off the adventure at Fishman Island, the Sunny is caught in a massive whirlpool and dragged off course. A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast.

28d322f9c9d6caa7.title: The Shirahoshi Kidnapping Incident and the Curse of the Mato Mato!
28d322f9c9d6caa7.description: Ryugu Palace falls into chaos. While Luffy escapes with Shirahoshi, the pirates who infiltrated its walls attack with a strange desperation. After a scuffle of their own, Sanji and Chopper come across an old friend with troubling injuries.

4aa0804daf47ad71.title: A Stolen Dream! Sanji vs. Absalom
4aa0804daf47ad71.description: Sanji crashes Absalom's sham of a wedding, the fire in his heart burning brightly as he rescues Nami. A curious connection between Sanji and the Clear-Clear Fruit is revealed, and he vows to defeat Absalom for ruining his lifelong dream.

c01bf83bb82f35b6.title: Buster Call
c01bf83bb82f35b6.description: Luffy gives Franky the opening he needs to head for Robin. The cyborg runs into trouble at the start of the bridge, but all is not lost as a lone sniper appears atop the Tower of Justice. Despite these minor victories, the buster call commences.

1004ecad22ae81d8.title: Heaven and Earth
1004ecad22ae81d8.description: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts toward slowing the birdcage. Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, advances to attack Viola, and a hero's recovery cannot come soon enough!

5a5ea2eaf6a15f2f.title: The Lake of Bandits
5a5ea2eaf6a15f2f.description: Luffy's group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami's group and place the Straw Hats into a state of chaos! Then, things heat up when G-5 squares off with Law.

64078fdc6dd1b2bb.title: Tsuru Returns the Favor
64078fdc6dd1b2bb.description: Luffy and Zoro are stalled by Hawkins, but their fortune looks bright when a woman guides them to a teahouse. There, they find an herbal remedy for the river poison that Otama drank, while old acquaintances look on from a distance.

9ce33ceff6c25801.title: Soldier's Conviction
9ce33ceff6c25801.description: Major players in the Marines arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats, and Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a cover story. Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port, but not before finishing up a piece of business.

1883c41a4b36ecfd.title: The Counterattack Begins!
1883c41a4b36ecfd.description: Law has a trick up his sleeve that turns the tide in the alliance's favor, to include an on-the-spot partnership with former foes. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, and it is all Luffy's group can do to ensure everyone's safety in the lab.

a7ee3e5aed80b9cb.title: Unknown Mama
a7ee3e5aed80b9cb.description: Wielding Napoleon and backed by Zeus and Prometheus, Big Mom wreaks havoc on the Sunny. As the Straw Hats try to kick out the Emperor, their ship catches fire! But then, Jinbe steps up to the plate to take a swing.

e76279289f760b1a.title: The Colosseum of Many New Faces and Maynard the Pursuer!
e76279289f760b1a.description: Luffy enters the tournament at Corrida Colosseum to compete for Ace's fruit, but with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal!

8c041201b00c66f0.title: What Are You?
8c041201b00c66f0.description: The Straw Hats hold their own against the powerful officers from Hody's crew. But their struggle will be in vain if Luffy cannot stop the Noah. Meanwhile, Hody becomes stronger than ever.

ad4e0f278070f969.title: Luffy and Whitebeard
ad4e0f278070f969.description: Luffy leaps into the fray! Battling against familiar faces and new foes alike, he races toward the scaffold like a whirlwind of destruction, and, as his brother begs for him to turn back, Luffy shares some powerful words of his own.

999cdaa1cfb5355b.title: Pirate Luffy vs. Commander Katakuri
999cdaa1cfb5355b.description: Desiring revenge after complete embarrassment, Big Mom's children band together to smash the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels, where each blow could be the last.

14a4652e07c9eb60.title: The State of the War
14a4652e07c9eb60.description: Law's reason for despising Doflamingo is revealed! Luffy heads toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through the guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who is now armed with a familiar fiery power!

6050f729fb211bd6.title: Gyukimaru of Bandit's Bridge
6050f729fb211bd6.description: Luffy fights in an endless sumo match to protect old man Hyo, and Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins raids the bathhouse. Elsewhere, Zoro faces a samurai who accuses him of stealing Shusui, but their duel is interrupted by a woman's scream.

3347aa4670f9ce2d.title: A Ray of Light
3347aa4670f9ce2d.description: When Pudding arrives to meet the captured Luffy and Nami, their hopefulness suddenly turns to shock! To make matters worse, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself! At the risk of his own well-being, Luffy desperately tries to free himself.

2d9f00261c3c29d5.title: Combination of Brains and Brawn! Oars and Moriah vs. the Straw Hats!
2d9f00261c3c29d5.description: To give Luffy a fighting chance against Moria, Lola and her pirate crew propose a plan to fight shadow with shadow. Meanwhile, Gecko Moria uses his abilities to enhance and manipulate Oars' massive body.

72193d5cda6f9ad2.title: Law's New Strategy and the Colosseum's Underground Nightmare!
72193d5cda6f9ad2.description: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault. Meanwhile, Bartolomeo searches the colosseum for Luffy and discovers something strange about the medical center for the defeated.

ae62b641bcad0de6.title: Monster
ae62b641bcad0de6.description: Chopper's abuse of his rumble balls results in a monstrous side effect. In the meantime, Nami learns how Kalifa's new devil fruit powers sapped Sanji of his strength, and a determined Luffy finally catches up to Spandam, Lucci and Robin.

2f83df2c495f0e30.title: The Mysterious Sea and The Skeleton Brook!
2f83df2c495f0e30.description: The Thousand Sunny gets flung into the foggy Florian Triangle and the Straw Hats encounter a ruined ship. Speculating as to whether there are ghosts aboard, it turns out the pirates are not far from the truth.

c2a8bdbb83f07ab4.title: END ROLL
c2a8bdbb83f07ab4.description: As the Big Mom Pirate fleet approaches, Jinbe makes a crucial decision. At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies, friends, and would-be lovers.

448472443e5d56ed.title: The Fifth Emperor
448472443e5d56ed.description: Luffy's reputation grows as all eyes look toward the Straw Hats' next move. Meanwhile, the royals of the world make their way to the Reverie, but their absence welcomes a raid by a vicious band of pirates on the Kingdom of Lulusia.

a1842fcb532e8813.title: Captain
a1842fcb532e8813.description: With Operation SOP in its final stage, the Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander's stunning true identity.

ce36361037a14608.title: Roger and Rayleigh
ce36361037a14608.description: The Marines surround the auction house, and super rookies Monkey D. Luffy, Eustass Kid, and Trafalgar Law all want a piece of the action. Later, Rayleigh reveals his shocking past to the Straw Hats.

2e942d741f089c57.title: First Son of the Sea
2e942d741f089c57.description: After forming an unlikely alliance, Luffy rushes through Impel Down aided by Buggy's powers. Meanwhile, Ace finds himself with an unlikely companion as well when he exchanges words with a powerful pirate prisoner.

f07f68e3927e128e.title: Veteran Actor
f07f68e3927e128e.description: Final preparations abound, plans come together, and Sanji meets his bride on the altar. As the veil is lifted off Pudding's face, emotions run high, and the chaos begins! As the proverbial icing on the cake, all hell breaks loose as Luffy charges in!

6129f02328aa136d.title: G-5's Sacrifice and the Betrayal of the Vice Admiral!
6129f02328aa136d.description: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, and Tashigi's men make the ultimate sacrifice! Luffy races toward Caesar to deliver on his promise to beat and capture him, and Chopper does all he can to keep the children from consuming more candy.

8b5e2b5f4ca2a42a.title: In My Way
8b5e2b5f4ca2a42a.description: Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. Meanwhile, neither Gear Second nor Gear Third attacks are working against Doflamingo, so Luffy decides to use something stronger!

4bd38f1b0deded7b.title: Luffy and Law's All-out Attack! The Takeover of the New Era!
4bd38f1b0deded7b.description: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, and the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed! Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!

8b3d222734e482a3.title: The Ruins of Oden Castle
8b3d222734e482a3.description: Zoro and the others dash out of Bakura Town on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them, and together, they distribute food and water to the people of Okobore Town. Later, Law takes them to the ruins of a hilltop castle.

6e174fd3e0ae8aff.title: Luffy vs. Sanji
6e174fd3e0ae8aff.description: Luffy finishes off Cracker and finally catches up with Sanji, but the Straw Hats' cook seems far from thrilled about the reunion. A heartbreaking duel commences, but a steadfast Luffy makes a solemn vow to his friend and crewmate.

3696759a288c6e72.title: The Hero's Hat
3696759a288c6e72.description: Filled with both excitement and trepidation, the crew finally sets sail for the New World. After bidding their fond farewells, the Straw Hats leave with a new log pose in hand. Overcoming trials and tragedies, Luffy's dream is on course once again!

f2d76eb277a11a98.title: The Big Showdown on the Judiciary Island!!
f2d76eb277a11a98.description: Luffy launches a one-man assault on Enies Lobby, and the rest of his allies work to break the first gate's defenses. What awaits Galley-La and the Franky Family at the second gate is a showdown of massive proportions!

5893f8b32c25271d.title: I'll Protect Everything
5893f8b32c25271d.description: Shirahoshi flees into the open sea, hoping to draw the Noah away from Fishman Island. Luffy follows her, but he must contend with Hody Jones along the way. Luckily, the appearance of a new ally gives Luffy a chance to protect Shirahoshi.

3d1052417ddf5912.title: The Hunter
3d1052417ddf5912.description: Kalifa attempts to counter Nami's mirages, and something must be done to save Chopper, still on a monstrous rampage. Zoro, now uncuffed, resumes his duel with Kaku. As Sogeking reaches his limit against Jabra, Sanji reappears, and he is hunting wolves.

2dd61e33f680f852.title: Friend
2dd61e33f680f852.description: With nowhere to run, Luffy's desperation to save Ace forces him to make a very grim sacrifice against his venomous adversary. Down in the frozen depths of Level 5, Bon Kurei rushes to his friend's aid, betting on a distant hope.

ede5c5d120d28cb6.title: Let's Go See Master Nekomamushi
ede5c5d120d28cb6.description: Being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate! The pirates make their way toward the nighttime ruler to find out more about their friend's disappearance.

e8a2b1b806298b02.title: Show Yourselves, Straw Hat Pirates! The Crew's Hopeless Counterattack!
e8a2b1b806298b02.description: With Oars now a fully obedient zombie, Gecko Moria takes his leave while instructing the giant to hunt down the pirates, whose wanted posters are sewn onto his arm. One by one, the Straw Hats' battles are interrupted by Oars' march around Thriller Bark.

ceb17103edfb6c58.title: To the East Blue
ceb17103edfb6c58.description: Sanji's tragic history included a rare moment of compassion that was his only chance at escape, but even then, his father's cruelty haunted him. In the present, Reiju helps Sanji straighten himself out before he meets with his fiancée.

bff856b3d7aa4161.title: Pirate Emperor, Charlotte Linlin
bff856b3d7aa4161.description: Big Mom ravages Whole Cake Island in search of sweets, and while a familiar face across the waters has just what she needs, he also brings ill tidings. As the Straw Hats draw closer to the island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory.

76bfe1d56b9eca77.title: Cabbage and Lomeo
76bfe1d56b9eca77.description: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield! While it appears to help Bartolomeo and co. at first, it soon sets its sights on Robin! As he continues to battle Gladius, Bartolomeo is faced with an impossible dilemma.

a6f4deb232661f8d.title: Under Siege
a6f4deb232661f8d.description: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 become cornered in Bege's stronghold, and the full might of the Big Mom Pirates is pinning them down! It is only a matter of time before their defenses crack, so they take the only way out and make a break for it.

d93e49a1f3202de1.title: Secret Plan
d93e49a1f3202de1.description: Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo. However, Sugar stands in their way, so Usopp uses Viola's clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take her out.

3a12012cdd120465.title: A Ray of Hope
3a12012cdd120465.description: Bon Kurei wanders through Level 5 in search of a mysterious missing prisoner. However, the fearsome wolves and bitter cold eventually take their toll, and he collapses in the Freezing Hell all while Luffy's life continues to dwindle away.

4b768b8cc29971e3.title: Ace and Whitebeard
4b768b8cc29971e3.description: To the surprise of all, the Moby Dick surfaces in the middle of Marineford! On the deck stands Whitebeard, the man who Ace calls father, and his fourteen commanders, the pirates he calls family, who share Luffy's determination to stop the execution.

294122219fc52196.title: An Island in Chaos
294122219fc52196.description: As chaos erupts inside the auction house, a mysterious man with an equally mysterious power emerges from backstage. But now, due to Luffy's insolent actions, a Marine admiral is on his way to Sabaody.

cd90dcd3090cfa5c.title: Vinsmoke Judge
cd90dcd3090cfa5c.description: Sanji faces his father in a duel as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare! Meanwhile, Luffy falls for the illusions of the forest, and Big Mom has Caesar at her whims, ready to use him to continue her maniacal pursuits.

8bef28a4a26b26de.title: They Believe in Me
8bef28a4a26b26de.description: The cake is finally brought before Big Mom. With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, the Straw Hats may just get their chance to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack, and Luffy grows ever closer to mastering his haki.

a4f8447714fa5701.title: Hey, Mother
a4f8447714fa5701.description: Luffy dashes toward Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again, and Sanji attempts to free his family. Here, Big Mom's tragic and sad history is revealed: from the very beginning, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others.

63c9dd25ff7cadc9.title: The Mermaid Princess in Hard-Shell Tower! Shirahoshi of the Neptune Family!
63c9dd25ff7cadc9.description: Plagued by the unwanted advances of a lunatic fishman with a dangerous power, Mermaid Princess Shirahoshi has been hidden away in a lonely tower for years. Meanwhile in the palace, things take a sour turn for the Straw Hats.

6f4866db6a8c1cd4.title: CC
6f4866db6a8c1cd4.description: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law. While Vice Admiral Smoker determines his next move, an exceptionally large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard's mysterious transformation!

d3b6c7471e04e616.title: The Circling Bounties and The Duel on Banaro Island!
d3b6c7471e04e616.description: The Straw Hats' new wanted posters begin circulating around the world, but three days earlier, Blackbeard began plotting their pursuit. However, one obstacle stood in his way; Ace had finally caught up to his estranged crewmate!

b7bb7ea9653fde49.title: Marine Headquarters
b7bb7ea9653fde49.description: Fifty warships, 100,000 Marines, the Seven Warlords, and three admirals: Akainu, Aokiji, and Kizaru. The stage is set, and, as a battle with Whitebeard looms, Fleet Admiral Sengoku reveals a shocking truth about Ace.

2483860a2e6496d3.title: Ohara vs. The World Government
2483860a2e6496d3.description: Robin's mother Olvia was on the run from the World Government, and tragedy was unavoidable from the moment Professor Clover and his colleagues decided to continue their research. No one on Ohara was safe.

b46e5a0cc07a2863.title: A World Abuzz
b46e5a0cc07a2863.description: Luffy's team—plus a stowaway—sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji. Meanwhile, the leading families and leaders of the world make their way to the Holy Land, Mary Geoise, for a pivotal round table conference.

880b15bdc4390790.title: The Invisible Man and the Secret of the Mansion!
880b15bdc4390790.description: While staying at Hogback's eerie mansion, Nami is assaulted by an invisible figure in the shower. It does not end there as Usopp battles haunted paintings with a handful of candles. Meanwhile, the rest of the Straw Hats finally make landfall.

5e441abe5647757a.title: The Hope and Despair of the Skeleton and the Straw Hats' Counterattack!
5e441abe5647757a.description: The Straw Hats regroup on the Sunny in a pitiable state, but not before Brook leaves Franky with some valuable information. In addition, they now know of the promise Brook made to a certain friend fifty years ago, someone the Straw Hats know well.

509034f1919d9ee6.title: One Last Thing
509034f1919d9ee6.description: Luffy's dramatic battle finally draws to a close, and a whole host of the Big Mom Pirates watch the last mirror to see who will come through.

e6bc8a046d08550f.title: Emperor Assassination Plan
e6bc8a046d08550f.description: The plan for Big Mom's assassination is all set. Sanji heads back to his room to avoid suspicion, but Mont d'Or is hot on his trail. The day arrives, and guests from the criminal underground pour in in droves, some with their own agendas to settle.

8cf6918f7404650c.title: You Can Do It, Caesar!!
8cf6918f7404650c.description: Caesar flies the entire alliance, still inside Bege, out of the venue! However, the full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much. The alliance's annihilation is imminent, but something shakes the playing field.

88ec0c36abaed81b.title: Father and Sons
88ec0c36abaed81b.description: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazón and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Luffy and the others finally make their break from the island; however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story of the Straw Hat Pirates!

b5ac64d1a68c43b7.title: The Strongest Family Lineage?! The Vice-Admiral and The Revolutionary!
b5ac64d1a68c43b7.description: Two days later in Water Seven, Franky hears that the item for he purchased with the Straw Hats' stolen money has arrived. While the pirates recover from the events at Enies Lobby, a Marine vice admiral arrives to pay Luffy an unexpected visit.

b4b76fddfd594acc.title: The Girl They Called a Devil
b4b76fddfd594acc.description: Twenty years ago, Nico Robin grew up on Ohara in the West Blue, striving to become an archaeologist like her mother. When Robin met Saul, a giant who washed onto the shores of Ohara, her life would forever be changed.

aa6afd9c8c4f1be4.title: Luffy and Big Mom
aa6afd9c8c4f1be4.description: Pedro creates a diversion for Brook to put his soulful plan into action. Meanwhile, the captured Luffy continues to goad Big Mom, and Pudding has the beginnings of rebellion stirring up inside her.

11ef8c1b13eeb636.title: Zoro vs. Kaku
11ef8c1b13eeb636.description: Spandam drags Robin along the Bridge of Hesitation and finally arrives at the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Zoro continues his clash with Kaku, and as things become more desperate, Zoro's rage begins to manifest as a dark aura.

0d64d73238955f63.title: Already Negative! Usopp's Courageous Stand!
0d64d73238955f63.description: Oars' entry into the fight suddenly changes everything! Then, when Perona attacks, only one of the pirates seems to be immune to her negative powers. Due to his glass-half-empty personality, Usopp might have what it takes to defeat the Ghost Princess.

8ecb9d02cfb28f0e.title: Mummy
8ecb9d02cfb28f0e.description: Babanuki unleashes an unthinkable weapon, and a mysterious figure emerges from a forbidden cell to save Luffy. Then, Old Man Hyo emboldens Raizo and Kiku to reveal their true identities and give the desperate prisoners some much-needed hope.

0b8da2046c0d22b2.title: Closely Contested Block C! Lucy and Ucy!
0b8da2046c0d22b2.description: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by Giolla's strange powers! Meanwhile, the battle for Block C is under way, but Luffy suffers a staggering setback. He eventually knocks down the giant Hajrudin, but Chinjao has his sights set on Garp's grandson!

2c296c8caeaab4cf.title: Adventure on the Ghost Island and the Famous Doctor Hogback!
2c296c8caeaab4cf.description: Brook bids the Straw Hats farewell, and they decide to explore the nearby ghost island Thriller Bark. Freakish danger awaits the landing party the moment they arrive, and, back on the Sunny, the rest of the crew is harassed by an unseen foe.

18dc37c736e5e8b3.title: 0 and 4
18dc37c736e5e8b3.description: Without Sanji to properly identify safe and edible food, Luffy gets a stomach full of poisonous fish! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a couple of mysterious—yet somehow familiar—passersby for help.

ffbfa12ff3375d56.title: Onward!! Army of Rogues
ffbfa12ff3375d56.description: The game is afoot, and Luffy finds that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! Strangely, an argument breaks out to decide who gets the honor of taking down Doflamingo once and for all!

f85d33a28f8c4cee.title: The Legend of the Mermaid
f85d33a28f8c4cee.description: Lucci corners Luffy, weakened by his new ability's aftereffects. Back on the bridge, Spandam makes an attempt on Robin's life, so Franky jumps into action. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang is about to drown in the flooded passageway.

6fd82d31e85e49e4.title: Zoro vs. Ryuuma and Chopper's Rage!
6fd82d31e85e49e4.description: Zoro stands in for Brook and duels Ryuma, the swordsman zombie from faraway Wano. In the mansion, Chopper's former respect for Dr. Hogback is completely erased after coming to realize the man's twisted views on life.

87f0ed1e7433f284.title: Vergo and Joker! The Beginning of Caesar's Masterplan!
87f0ed1e7433f284.description: Caesar gathers his young test subjects, shocking secret identities are revealed, and the poisonous purple blob continues its march across the island! Meanwhile, Nami and Usopp get an unexpected helping hand in their fight to save the children.

f1fe84fdb8550479.title: The Prisoners of Impel Down
f1fe84fdb8550479.description: Facing Kuma on the battlefield, Ivankov reveals their shared past, but his pleas to his old companion fall on deaf ears as Kuma continues his attacks. In a sea of confusion, only Doflamingo seems to know the truth.

ba1fe2d7c794b1f3.title: The King of Fishman Island Invited to Ryugu Palace!
ba1fe2d7c794b1f3.description: The pirates receive an unexpected invitation to Ryugu Palace from Neptune himself, king of Fishman Island. Tempted by the smell of food, Luffy wanders the palace and soon finds an enormous tower with a sturdy yet battle-worn door.

caa3bba93f2830b5.title: Lola's Vivre Card
caa3bba93f2830b5.description: The mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his identity, but this must all be put aside when one of Big Mom's most powerful commanders comes calling. Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping the baddies at bay.

b1b64da5f8be87d4.title: Perona's Wonder Garden and the Charge of the General Zombies!
b1b64da5f8be87d4.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper manage to escape their coffin but find themselves in a garden surrounded by animal zombies, including one acting remarkably like Sanji. It also seems that one by one, the Straw Hats are disappearing.

5f61de18ddc4ebe3.title: To Russian, with Love
5f61de18ddc4ebe3.description: Senor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both are pushed to their limits, Senor Pink's tragic past is revealed! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!

2ed4ed16ebe104ed.title: Clash! The Titanic Battle Against Zombie 900!
2ed4ed16ebe104ed.description: The Straw Hats sans Luffy are faced with the insurmountable task of taking out Oars. To knock him down, Franky decides they will need to use his newly developed tactic. But as they begin "docking" onto one another, a slight problem arises.

e3bc3ce1496ce3a2.title: I Couldn't Save Them!!!
e3bc3ce1496ce3a2.description: In the face of overwhelming danger, Luffy orders a full retreat. However, Warlord Kuma cuts off their frenzied escape and uses a harrowing touch of his devil fruit powers against Luffy's crewmates, one by one.

535a03023f7b5be4.title: Wano's Grand Sumo Tournament
535a03023f7b5be4.description: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in Wano, to a sumo match! However, Urashima is willing to resort to illegal moves. Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he must punish her for a crime she committed.

0edab118b46e87a6.title: Zero Escape
0edab118b46e87a6.description: In the Mirro-world, Luffy confronts the formidable Charlotte Katakuri, Big Mom's strongest child. Meanwhile, Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island to remake the cake, but they bicker like a married couple the whole time.

48dcf9a9f70851b4.title: Executive Officer Pica
48dcf9a9f70851b4.description: Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game with the highest bounty reserved for… Usopp! As Luffy and co. head toward the palace, Fujitora stands in their way, and Pica emerges in town to change the stakes of the game.

baff48a39cb82144.title: The Power That Can Deflect Anything?! Zoro Fights Prepared to Die!
baff48a39cb82144.description: Moria's defeat returns the shadows of all his victims. However, one Warlord remains on the island, and he has orders to terminate the Straw Hats and everyone else in the area. A lone Zoro faces Kuma in vain and is presented with a deadly choice.

b64b8cdb90369e94.title: Zoro vs. Pica
b64b8cdb90369e94.description: Pica loses his temper and becomes a terrible and true force of nature. With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught.

ea66cd07de5f0148.title: Justice Will Prevail!!
ea66cd07de5f0148.description: A larger-than-life ally risks his life to pave the way forward, and the Whitebeard Pirates rush toward Ace. However, just as their rescue mission picks up momentum, Sengoku employs a surprise tactic that turns the tide yet again.

d415dd798660f8fa.title: SOP Strategy
d415dd798660f8fa.description: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law, but Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The toy soldier lays out the plan to liberate the Tontattas and bring down the Doflamingo Family: Operation SOP.

430c13b9b617acfc.title: Raizo of the Mist
430c13b9b617acfc.description: Revelations abound as the true nature of the men from Wano and their relationship with the minks is revealed, and Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined. But even more shocking is the visage of a real ninja!

fca39226f05905d4.title: White Town
fca39226f05905d4.description: A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to try and kill Corazón! Law was accepted into the Doflamingo Family, but Corazón's mysterious silence hid a fact that just may have saved Law's life.

ca59364f51138489.title: Wave Room
ca59364f51138489.description: Nami and Luffy discuss a rendezvous point while the others break the mirrors on the Sunny. Little do they know their plan is overheard, and Luffy's grueling battle against Katakuri—haki vs. haki, rubber vs. mochi—intensifies.

27ff10f6e36fbad5.title: Brook's Past! The Rumbar Pirates and Laboon!
27ff10f6e36fbad5.description: Brook recalls his past, thinking back on the time when the small whale Laboon started following his pirate ship and befriended the crew.

1096a9dba3297a68.title: The Superhumans of Enies Lobby
1096a9dba3297a68.description: As the Straw Hats and their allies approach Enies Lobby on Rocketman, they hatch a plan to save Robin before she passes through the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Spandam holds a meeting with CP9 where they await Lucci's return in the Tower of Justice.

784a46a1b88a0fe4.title: D Block's Fiery Start and the Heavenly Demon's Revelation!
784a46a1b88a0fe4.description: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage and vicious contenders set their sights on her. Meanwhile, Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand.

59478a2207511a2d.title: Lion
59478a2207511a2d.description: Sanji and Bege contend with Charlotte Oven, who boils the sea itself! Meanwhile, a vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats, but Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs to action under the light of the full moon.

6eed1b03f8c9aef7.title: Battle
6eed1b03f8c9aef7.description: Heavy hitters from the colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks toward a unified plan, which might be just enough to give Luffy the chance he needs to make it to a final showdown with Doflamingo.

ecb29f092aef4c43.title: Kizaru vs. the Four Captains
ecb29f092aef4c43.description: While four super rookies square off against Kizaru, the Straw Hats combine their strongest attacks to defeat the pacifista menacing them. The battle is barely won when yet another, deadlier foe comes to take its place.

e1571b84a886e4e9.title: The Spear of Elbaph and Don Sai
e1571b84a886e4e9.description: Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns within him to pay back the favor he owes! Lao G and Don Chinjao bring their most devastating attacks to bear, but a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted.

7ac05e6e4525f997.title: The Extent of the Grand Line and The 600,000,000 Crew!
7ac05e6e4525f997.description: In the New World, not even the Marines' best can keep Red-Haired Shanks from meeting Whitebeard with an especially important request. Meanwhile, at Water Seven, the Franky Family comes to the Straw Hats with some "bad" news.

3fa9a93373afa0e2.title: The Embers of History
3fa9a93373afa0e2.description: While at Shakky's Rip-off Bar, the Straw Hats learn that Luffy, Zoro and nine other rookie pirates on Sabaody have reached a certain level of infamy. Later, Zoro has a close call with an insufferable and sadistic Celestial Dragon.

dfd5e9bd8b60d64c.title: Jump into the Waterfall!!
dfd5e9bd8b60d64c.description: Franky stages his own rebellious act against Spandam while Luffy's crew makes a daring leap of faith to hopefully gain entrance to the Tower of Justice.

44ded6997034f595.title: Pirates vs. CP9
44ded6997034f595.description: The Straw Hats split up to find the correct key before Robin's fate is sealed. Zoro finds and engages Kaku in battle, and Sogeking attempts to steal a key from the sleeping Jabra.

179eca9d84446fbb.title: The Crew's Annihilation! Oars vs. Nightmare Luffy
179eca9d84446fbb.description: Moria's strange combination with Oars defeats the Straw Hats one after the other. They are at their breaking point when a powerful figure swoops in and takes up the fight in their stead. The hellish creation: Nightmare Luffy!

88f80db742e392a7.title: The Provisions Ship
88f80db742e392a7.description: Luffy and co. finally find Otama hanging from the mouth of a lion in Holdem's stomach. Luffy prepares to save Otama from Kaido's lackey, and elsewhere, a mysterious figure confronts Basil Hawkins.

7761264eb389fe86.title: Enma
7761264eb389fe86.description: As the day of the raid approaches, Kin'emon discusses the plan, and at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a surprising declaration! In the meantime, Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.

e9efeff3af0ecba6.title: Not Here
e9efeff3af0ecba6.description: Luffy fights through more obstacles in search of Sanji, and Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding. While Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under their control, Mont d'Or has his doubts.

97fa2dcebd79c868.title: Dive, Dive, Dive!
97fa2dcebd79c868.description: After two long years and one chaotic afternoon, the Straw Hats are finally ready to renew their voyage. However, before they can set off to Fishman Island, they must contend with a massive Marine force determined to stop them.

0f0c62e0f4dc70c8.title: A Woman's Honor
0f0c62e0f4dc70c8.description: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, the plan to recreate the wedding cake progresses while Pudding's unpredictable heart confuses everyone, including herself.

c19b374e0237f0d5.title: Rook
c19b374e0237f0d5.description: Jinbe tells the Straw Hats about Capone “Gang” Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom! But before they are granted an audience with Bege, they must make themselves presentable.

901caab51ba8de70.title: Vice Admiral vs. Vice Admiral and the Truth Behind Punk Hazard's Destruction!
901caab51ba8de70.description: Smoker attacks the estranged Vice Admiral Vergo for assaulting his men, and in the trash heap, Luffy meets something strange. Meanwhile, Caesar's bloated words to his men about the island's history do not match what occurred.

db92d7a1cdd0ad85.title: RAMPAGE
db92d7a1cdd0ad85.description: Kanjuro takes Yasuie's body to bury him with Oden, and Robin, Usopp, and Brook cleverly pass a checkpoint. While Big Mom and Kaido clash at Onigashima, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies in Udon. And in Ringo, Zoro faces Gyukimaru once more.

e4fb188fd83486dd.title: Germa's Failure
e4fb188fd83486dd.description: Things are looking grim for Luffy and Nami until an unexpected ally appears. Elsewhere, Sanji confronts his sister about what Pudding plans to do and learns the powerful secret of their mother's undying love.

4704004053989382.title: The Times They Are A-Changin'
4704004053989382.description: Ace is free at last, and the pair of brothers are unstoppable! Although the Whitebeard Pirates are emboldened by their teamwork, their captain is not convinced that their escape will come so easily, and Whitebeard makes a difficult decision.

0b7a8284786647c2.title: Liar
0b7a8284786647c2.description: Nami and co. finally locate Brook using the Mirro-world, but he is in the most inopportune of places! Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous, and Jinbe shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hat pirates.

d59d84b4c0f78548.title: A Beautiful World
d59d84b4c0f78548.description: At New Marineford, Fleet Admiral Sakazuki hears the news about Luffy while nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie! At the Red Line, Garp is escorting King Neptune's family when Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time.

99e2880d2b84cecf.title: A Sad Past! Rebecca and Soldier-san
99e2880d2b84cecf.description: A voice from the past unsettles Luffy and sends him into a rage! Also, it's discovered that Rebecca's eternal bond with the one-legged toy soldier is linked to the violent overthrow of the old regime, perpetrated by none other than Doflamingo!

8a75fab713dab7ab.title: The Operation Fruit
8a75fab713dab7ab.description: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; however, the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and he reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention.

eb4a427fa7917d7f.title: Blizzard with a Chance of Slime
eb4a427fa7917d7f.description: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, and Law tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory! And then, Luffy's battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob.

b4a350a023198215.title: Landing on Fishman Island! The Mermaid Cove and Gyoverly Hills!
b4a350a023198215.description: After a near miss with a creepy undersea ship and Fishman Island in sight, Luffy's crew is halted by a group of fishmen riding atop sea kings. But time is of the essence, so the Straw Hats attempt a desperate maneuver.

8c0e5808135eba36.title: If You Could Go Anywhere... The Adventures of the Straw Hats
8c0e5808135eba36.description: Somewhere in the world... Sanji resists, while Robin meets terrible people. Franky's not himself, and Usopp learns to survive. Chopper avoids becoming food, and Nami reports on the weather. Brook is repaid in underpants, and Zoro... is lost and annoyed.

a88b228919395131.title: Declaration of War
a88b228919395131.description: To prove his undying loyalty to Robin, Luffy makes a defiant statement to the World Government.

e9e690269e201880.title: I Love Oden
e9e690269e201880.description: Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden brought peace to Kuri and became its daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Orochi. When Kin'emon ran to save Oden's wife, she revealed a shocking truth.

49dd72dd805ac987.title: Gyoncorde Plaza Gathering! The Evil Drug's True Power
49dd72dd805ac987.description: Hody experiences a strange side effect of the energy steroids, and his body undergoes a horrifying transformation! The three princes of the Ryugu Kingdom rush to the scene, but Hody's crewmates have a dirty trick up their sleeves.

c198a60d238b48da.title: Unprecedented
c198a60d238b48da.description: Kaku and Kalifa of CP9 are offered a rare chance for new powers and are each served a devil fruit. The Straw Hats finally arrive at the courthouse plaza when Spandam receives an urgent call, and he realizes things are much worse than previously reported.

e6ca71588f88abfa.title: Arrival at Coral Hill! The Nosebleed and the Devastating Prediction!
e6ca71588f88abfa.description: The mermaids of Fishman Island give the Straw Hats a warm welcome, but Sanji is struck with a sudden medical emergency! Luffy and co. take their anemic friend to the Mermaid Cafe to rest, where they are introduced to its soothsaying owner.

e4ba2c594f82f3e4.title: To Green Bit! The Adventure in the Land of Dwarves!
e4ba2c594f82f3e4.description: The Caesar Transfer Team is on approach to Green Bit, but the colossal coastal fish of Dressrosa are biting, and the connecting bridge has collapsed! The team gathers their wits to make it across, but they soon discover they are not alone on the island.

228c9e240d7b7dd4.title: A Soldier's Dream
228c9e240d7b7dd4.description: In Udon, an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners renewed hope! Elsewhere, Zoro and Hiyori are pursued by ninja, Orochi is told of Trafalgar Law's capture, and the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.

78ae5052604bc24f.title: Thank You
78ae5052604bc24f.description: Thanks to Jinbe's quick thinking, Luffy and co. narrowly escape Impel Down. However, the Gates of Justice remain closed, and a horde of Marine ships is gaining on them. Then, just when all hope seems lost, a dear friend makes an all-or-nothing gamble.

a982f3df3703671e.title: The Iron Mask
a982f3df3703671e.description: Sanji challenges his entire family, but they have effectively ensured he follows their wedding scheme. The truth of Germa's power and Vinsmoke Judge's dark history is also revealed. Meanwhile, Nami has recruited the homies and challenges Cracker!

5f7cd9fbb4409270.title: Otoko the Kamuro
5f7cd9fbb4409270.description: In the Prisoner Mining Camp, Luffy's and Kid's competition garners the wrong kind of attention. Meanwhile, Sanji's soba becomes immensely popular, but gang members disturb his business and knock over a customer's bowl.

5fb640d79729d708.title: The Terrifying Emergency Broadcast
5fb640d79729d708.description: As the Marines eke out a comeback against the Straw Hats' allies, Spandam makes the call Robin most dreaded. In the meantime, Lucci and Luffy begin their mutually anticipated duel, while Nami and Kalifa's fight enters the next phase.

557e6c9fbb8b868c.title: The Island of Fate: Minion
557e6c9fbb8b868c.description: Things grew stranger for Law when he learned the secret behind why Corazón feigned being mute. But the mysterious Corazón's actions were only beginning to baffle Law when he took him on a journey to cure the youth's disease.

0d03668f3ae69049.title: Dressrosa in Turmoil
0d03668f3ae69049.description: Usopp creates a miracle! Toys across Dressrosa regain their true forms, a flood of lost memories return, and a forgotten hero launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!

966ab019ffc6b2a2.title: Express to the Main Island of Enies Lobby
966ab019ffc6b2a2.description: Robin and Franky are finally brought before Spandam while Luffy continues to blast through waves of marines. Galley-La and the Franky Family still have one giant to deal with, and the main gate closes to halt Rocketman's entry.

26345ad57bdd5e9a.title: The War's Conclusion
26345ad57bdd5e9a.description: Senseless violence dyes the battlefield red with blood. Luffy's allies struggle to save him as the admirals maintain their assault. Suddenly, the Red Hair Pirates appear! Narrowly missing a reunion with Luffy, Shanks utters a speech on the battlefield.

9f56a4cd090d29fd.title: The Fearsome Ability of the Shadow Fruit! The Ultimate Number 900!
9f56a4cd090d29fd.description: Gecko Moria takes his next step toward his goal of eventually becoming king of the pirates by creating the ultimate zombie. Luffy's shadow in hand, Moria begins the revival of the much-anticipated number 900.

9a58c1f1a8987920.title: Sparks of Rebellion
9a58c1f1a8987920.description: The smiling man Tonoyasu leaves all who met him mystified, what with his familiar terms of address and his shocking knowledge of the rebellion. In Udon prison, Luffy continues his new haki training, and during a brief respite, Raizo appears before him.

8e42b7b0dd697d05.title: Edward Newgate
8e42b7b0dd697d05.description: Blackbeard appears, Thatch's murder and Ace's capture all part of a terrifying plan that no one could have imagined! With the war in its final stage, Whitebeard fights to avenge his fallen sons and to punish the traitor who plotted his undoing.

5f3a943aeb212038.title: The Execution Platform
5f3a943aeb212038.description: Having borne witness to Luffy's latent powers, the Marines send everything they have at him. But thanks to Ivankov's quick thinking, Luffy ascends toward Ace. Garp, unable to watch any longer, leaps into Luffy's path.

ecd7e6b11f6b9d7c.title: The General from the Future Land and the Crisis of Fishman Island's Destruction
ecd7e6b11f6b9d7c.description: Franky's mechanical masterpieces have transformations in store that can only be described as "super!" However, onlookers curb their enthusiasm when a foreboding shadow is cast upon the plaza by a giant ship hurtling toward the island!

cbc83cee5738dec3.title: Phantom
cbc83cee5738dec3.description: Neptune's army aids the Straw Hats against the New Fishman Pirates, finally accepting the crew as allies. As the fight continues, Fukaboshi's transponder snail reveals the bone chilling truth behind Hody's motivations.

b024b8de03f3a747.title: Conflict at the Summit
b024b8de03f3a747.description: The players have assembled at last! Whitebeard unleashes a tsunami that is set to swallow every marine and turn Marine HQ upside down. The fight has just begun, as Marine admirals and pirate commanders alike showcase their incredible abilities.

386ac9eeb4511416.title: Soba Mask
386ac9eeb4511416.description: In the Flower Capital, a member of the Beast Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in search of Sanji. The Straw Hat's cook faces Kaido's headliner while using Germa's device for the first time to hide his identity.

9127ece0690a0ede.title: The Arena
9127ece0690a0ede.description: Luffy is sentenced to execution by arena combat with Boa Hancock's serpentine sisters. Luffy soon discovers that the two women have a mysterious ability that allows them to slither through all his attacks unharmed.

30df36af3a9803d8.title: The White Monster
30df36af3a9803d8.description: Faced with the might of the admirals, even Whitebeard's commanders falter. Refusing to relent, Luffy begs Ivankov for a final chance at victory. Amid a bevy of Marines, an old friend of Luffy's appears for a much too premature reunion.

2a3897df952a5b0c.title: No One Can Stop This Now
2a3897df952a5b0c.description: As Luffy prepares to depart Amazon Lily, Hancock suddenly takes ill. Taking heed of the knowledge and wisdom of Elder Nyon, the Snake Princess “recovers,” and a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.

a83d060f140d1139.title: Perona's Terror! Usopp vs. the Ghost Princess!
a83d060f140d1139.description: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona! He reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in this spooky battle.

15b1f73f683bbf6b.title: The Path Toward the Sun
15b1f73f683bbf6b.description: Hody is vanquished, the Noah is stopped, and Fishman Island is saved! Unfortunately, Luffy was gravely injured in the process. With no time to spare, a true friend steps forward to tear down the walls of the island's history.

5b242db603b0677e.title: Forces of Rage
5b242db603b0677e.description: Luffy stands his ground and waits for Sanji to return, but as the vengeful army washes over him, only a true friend can step in to help. At Big Mom's castle, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage and come to a startling conclusion!

15f2904ea7cac792.title: From One Hell to Another
15f2904ea7cac792.description: Luffy and his dubious companions face off against the mythical beasts of Level 2. Impel Down is put on lockdown, its only exit sealed, but Luffy, unaware and unafraid, continues to Ace's floor, only to have another unexpected reunion.

cde6993446f1d974.title: C Block's Blazing Battle and the Forgotten of Dressrosa!
cde6993446f1d974.description: In the colosseum, Chinjao finally faces Luffy and reveals the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontattas' raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa's living toys.

97921ac02d5eb255.title: Gear Second
97921ac02d5eb255.description: The Straw Hats storm the courthouse where the three-headed judge Baskerville awaits to enact violent judgment upon them. On the roof, Luffy thanks CP9's Blueno for the strength of his opponents, and he activates a new ability.

04c3bb29b70336fb.title: A Man's World
04c3bb29b70336fb.description: Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along! Meanwhile, the Tontattas are in full revolt, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Senor Pink.

337acf92fa149d67.title: Inferno Hell
337acf92fa149d67.description: Luffy and his deranged team pummel everything from Level 3 to Level 4 that dares to stand in their path. However, the powerful guard Minotaurus is ready to do some pummeling of his own while a boiling bath of blood awaits below.

bf3fee54c558df87.title: The Strongest Grizzly Magnum and the Assassins from Dressrosa!
bf3fee54c558df87.description: Law concludes his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating blow on the murderous gasbag mastermind. Meanwhile, word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar.

8c1796b1c939dd3b.title: Thank You for Loving Me
8c1796b1c939dd3b.description: Ace protects his brother from Akainu but suffers a mortal blow in the process. Jinbe and the Whitebeard Pirates rush to his aid but soon realize he is far beyond help. As Ace takes his final breaths, he imparts a heartfelt message.

e0a83b1009a6defc.title: Merienda
e0a83b1009a6defc.description: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy a merienda—a sweet chance to replenish his haki! But he is not the only one munching away. A mochi mountain has crushed Luffy, and he has found a delectable way to escape.

1a622dc8b348606b.title: The Plight of the Riku Clan! The Lurking Hero Awaits in the Shadows!
1a622dc8b348606b.description: The losers of the colosseum who are being held below the infirmary have an unexpected addition to their numbers. Meanwhile, the history of Tontatta is made clear, as is the shocking identity of the toy soldier!

e94ff913f09a1c02.title: Assault
e94ff913f09a1c02.description: The pirates are trapped in the bay, held there by Akainu's magma. Amid the chaos, the order for Ace's execution is given, and Luffy makes a drastic decision that puts him face-to-face with the Marines' most powerful men.

d9930c3b991a3c64.title: The Shogun and the Oiran
d9930c3b991a3c64.description: At the shogun's banquet, the oiran's child attendant Otoko bursts with laughter and cannot stop. The enraged Shogun Orochi attacks her, but an unexpected person stands in his way. To end the to-do, Kyoshiro takes matters into his own hands.

ff684ba16d8d0182.title: Oiran Komurasaki Arrives
ff684ba16d8d0182.description: Wano's top courtesan—the oiran Komurasaki—is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. While everyone is fascinated by the oiran, some seeking vengeance get in her way.

fdf52d9ae0ef026e.title: Doflamingo Arrives! The Ultimate Schemer!
fdf52d9ae0ef026e.description: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Sanji gets in touch with Law to share a shocking secret that could unsettle all their plans in Dressrosa.

bbf723165e6ce737.title: To Sunshine and Freedom
bbf723165e6ce737.description: It is utter chaos in Impel Down, and between the sudden appearance of Blackbeard, the vice warden's interference, and Magellan's dogged attempts to restore order, the escape team just might see daylight yet!

fa1dccc720950436.title: 100,000 vs. 10! The Straw Hats' Explosive Moves
fa1dccc720950436.description: The Straw Hats have reassembled at last, an army of New Fishman Pirates standing before them. With the last two years still fresh in their minds, the Straw Hats' training is put to the test, and they unleash a flurry of new techniques.

b5c2725d9c6af20c.title: The Man Who Shook the World
b5c2725d9c6af20c.description: Squard's betrayal of Whitebeard sends ripples of distrust and uncertainty throughout the pirate alliance. And yet, Whitebeard's faith will not be shattered, and it soon becomes clear that his allies are falling into a clever setup launched by the Marines.

b1a8c460efffe3e9.title: The Astonishing Thousand Sunny and Usopp's Tearful Apology!
b1a8c460efffe3e9.description: The Straw Hats set sail, but Usopp is conspicuously missing. Zoro soberly reminds Luffy that Usopp's return should not be granted so casually. More immediately, the pirates need to avoid Garp's barrage of cannon balls!

f1f9e8413e634901.title: Tea Party Invitation
f1f9e8413e634901.description: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance only deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys caught up with him and offered him an invitation from one of the Four Emperors that simply could not be refused.

db5d73e2a68e30bd.title: Rob Lucci
db5d73e2a68e30bd.description: With time running out, Luffy activates another special ability. The vice admirals of the buster call are shocked to see Luffy taking on Rob Lucci and recall how the CP9 enforcer, even in his youth, held strongly to a dark sense of justice.

abe0b7fcc974851c.title: Shutenmaru
abe0b7fcc974851c.description: Ashura Doji, a.k.a Shutenmaru, is one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, and he leads a raid on Okobore Town to steal the food that Luffy brought. This unrest prompts the drunken Kaido to fly above Okobore Town in his dragon form.

d7413c6ade79b4bc.title: The Beginning of the Vengeful Plan! Zoro vs. Hody!
d7413c6ade79b4bc.description: Hody's plan for revenge is set in motion, and the Straw Hats who have unwittingly taken control of the palace must now defend it against the New Fishman Pirates. Outside, Luffy's excursion with Shirahoshi is rudely interrupted.

f2ce1e30eba93ee2.title: Into the Depths! The Kraken and the Caribou Pirates
f2ce1e30eba93ee2.description: Encased in a protective bubble, the Sunny departs for Fishman Island far under the sea. As the Straw Hats marvel at the sights, Franky tells the crew about their greatest ally in their time apart. But suddenly, a mysterious shadow closes in on the ship.

9229beae09e92fd7.title: Bellamy's Changed Motivations and B Block's Start!
9229beae09e92fd7.description: When Block A concludes, the crowds are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner. Block B commences, and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring, but he will have to contend with Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy!

ea3a07e6311e61c3.title: Death Is Also Revenge
ea3a07e6311e61c3.description: Luffy has a fist of fire with Hody's name on it, and the rest of the Straw Hats push forward with all their might. Hody takes even more energy steroids, and a gravely injured Luffy struggles to overcome the fishman's unbelievable stamina.

99123aabbf95d922.title: Shaking of the Kingdom! Luffy vs. Jinbe!
99123aabbf95d922.description: After completing his tale, Jinbe begs Nami for forgiveness. Soon after, Hody broadcasts across all of Fishman Island, and all watch in horror as he conducts his hostile takeover. Luffy is ready to fight, but Jinbe has something else in mind.

d3943b901c555166.title: The Tontatta Rebellion and the C Block Finale!
d3943b901c555166.description: The Tontattas gear up for their all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, and Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Luffy concludes his earth-shattering fight to the death with Don Chinjao.

02903c77e92e80b9.title: Die for Me! The Dangerous Man Makes His Move!
02903c77e92e80b9.description: As the Straw Hats and co. flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies. Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar.

1f0ed0e17c66226b.title: Morning Comes! The Straw Hats' Ultimate Attack!
1f0ed0e17c66226b.description: Oars recovers from Nightmare Luffy's assault, but the Straw Hats all get back on their feet and launch a final devastating attack on Oars. Morning fast approaches, and Moria is far from finished, ready to use his ultimate technique.

a337522bbaeffc6d.title: Island of New Beginnings
a337522bbaeffc6d.description: Luffy, in disguise, crosses paths with the fake Luffy, and the imposter finds himself on the receiving end of a mysterious power. Meanwhile, Sentomaru and the Marines have yet again amassed a team of Pacifistas.

ffe8349646da4441.title: Olin
ffe8349646da4441.description: A very big and hungry visitor arrives at Udon looking for Superstar Queen's sweet red bean oshiruko, and Rasetsu town is in a full-blown riot with the Straw Hats at the center!

7d95f3635ea64eae.title: Queen vs. Olin
7d95f3635ea64eae.description: To Chopper's surprise, the kind and sweet Olin—a.k.a. Emperor Big Mom—has proven her power to be just as devastating as ever. Olin's hunger pangs just about reach their limit, and Luffy must act quickly before his mechanical collar executes him.

e2112919f41a3b98.title: Usoland the Liar
e2112919f41a3b98.description: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make.

79931f1ce2c039c4.title: Trump Card
79931f1ce2c039c4.description: Gladius' exploding spheres send Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling directly into Luffy and co.'s battle with some creepy dolls. Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, and Sabo tastes Fujitora's full might!

153b3be99354439e.title: Emperor Kaido vs. Luffy
153b3be99354439e.description: Infuriated by Kaido's violence toward his allies, Luffy lands blow after blow on the drunken Emperor. When he activates Gear Fourth and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back. Law tries to rescue Luffy but is interrupted by Hawkins.

8c5a85864fd2d80c.title: The Curse of Heart
8c5a85864fd2d80c.description: The Tontattas finish demolishing the SMILE Factory and taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, the birdcage draws ever tighter around Dressrosa.

b9aa367e053a5f59.title: The Minks
b9aa367e053a5f59.description: The mysterious "island" may hold more danger than was bargained for, as Luffy and co. learn they are not alone! Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest, but he is treading territory where he is not welcome.

06b7a47dff2983ac.title: Two Years Later
06b7a47dff2983ac.description: Two years after the Summit War, the Straw Hat crew finally returns to Sabaody. However, the archipelago has changed, and with dangerous pirates lurking around in droves, their departure to the New World may not go as smoothly as hoped.

d3e3ba4fdf34d269.title: Adventure on the Burning Island
d3e3ba4fdf34d269.description: Luffy, Robin, Usopp, and Zoro face a powerful dragon, and Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less figure. Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face!

4d5654aa7019c5be.title: Duke Inuarashi and Master Nekomamushi
4d5654aa7019c5be.description: The Straw Hats finally meet the daytime ruler of this strange land. They learn more about the battle that took place here and discover the mysterious system by which the island is ruled.

2bc9b390c2010bad.title: Hyogoro the Flower
2bc9b390c2010bad.description: Chopper's group is off to rescue Luffy from the Prisoner Mining Camp, but the Straw Hat captain is in a bit of a bind. While Luffy tries to save old man Hyo from execution, Queen the Plague comes to visit the prison.

757ef30ebe70058f.title: Mr. Chivalry
757ef30ebe70058f.description: Sanji faces his greatest weakness: fighting a beautiful woman! Meanwhile, Franky begins to run low on cola energy, but he must battle the peculiar Fukuro to obtain more of his refreshing fuel from the kitchen.

cc6f812a2004c5d1.title: The Auction House Incident
cc6f812a2004c5d1.description: Nami's group arrives at the Grove 1 auction house where Camie will be sold to the highest bidder. With 200 million berries in hand, Nami is determined to win back their friend. The auction wears on as Luffy and co. race to the grove.

5c7857e4a01b64cf.title: Number 900?! Lola's Pursuit and the Humming Swordsman
5c7857e4a01b64cf.description: Lola attacks Nami out of ignorant jealousy, but the Sanji-esque zombie plays interference. Meanwhile, with Luffy captured, and Franky and Robin left to face a massive spider monkey, a familiar bony figure falls from the sky.

244ba5a0564bb2d8.title: Forgive Yourself! Franky Departs!
244ba5a0564bb2d8.description: The Straw Hats have barely had time to marvel at their new bounties when a new surprise awaits them: the unveiling of their magnificent new ship. The next step is bringing a shipwright into their ranks, and there is only one man for the job.

9627ecc35d58977e.title: At Rightflank Fortress
9627ecc35d58977e.description: Luffy and co. ride out the rain-ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou. As they continue toward the fortress, they learn more about the mysterious minks, and are finally reunited with the others.

6273d38d479b4e36.title: Gatz
6273d38d479b4e36.description: Using Boundman drains Luffy of his haki, leaving him in need of a rest. Luckily, the colosseum combatants run interference while he recharges, and Sabo steps in at a crucial moment to defend his brother.

6755631caed284f2.title: The Shipwrecked Celestial Dragon! A Bullet That Seals the Future
6755631caed284f2.description: The sudden appearance of a Celestial Dragon almost imperiled Fishman Island, but Queen Otohime's ability to end hostilities provided a ray of hope for everyone. Just when the path to the future seemed bright, a shot echoed through the plaza.

2f03cd99e447a252.title: BAD END MUSICAL
2f03cd99e447a252.description: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain. Now, the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! With the help of Germa and the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape!

7516d209928dfcc8.title: Pirate Empress Boa Hancock
7516d209928dfcc8.description: Luffy storms the village of women in hopes of acquiring a boat. However, a misstep lands him in the personal bath of none other than the Snake Princess. As he peers through the steam rising from its waters, he sees a forbidden secret etched upon her back.

8e8491781cbee22a.title: Yet Another Epic Incident
8e8491781cbee22a.description: A veritable all-star team on his side, Luffy and co. battle their way back up to Level 4. On Level 2, a massive riot erupts, plunging the prison into chaos. To further complicate matters, another infamous pirate breaks into Impel Down.

974c682f19d14542.title: Kizaru Arrives
974c682f19d14542.description: Luffy and his crew decide to lay low in town while Rayleigh coats the Sunny. Meanwhile, Admiral Kizaru from Marine HQ arrives on the archipelago in search of those responsible for threatening the Celestial Dragons.

30d1c5f9316977ae.title: Zou
30d1c5f9316977ae.description: The mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. When the haze clears, what greets the Straw Hats is beyond anyone's expectations! Luffy and co. find the Sunny nearby, but the rest of the crew has already disembarked.
